active_power.docs:
Use the (active) power value for the Grid in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**, int**: The address of the sensor if multiple sensors are attached to the same UART bus. You will need to set the address of each device manually. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

energy_production_day.docs:
Use the export active energy value for same day of the sensor in kilo watt hours. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

frequency.docs:
Use the frequency value of the sensor in hertz. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

inverter_module_temp.docs:
Use the inverter module temperature value of the sensor in degree celsius. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

inverter_status.docs:
Status code of the inverter (0: waiting, 1: normal, 3:fault)

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

phase_a.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Phase A/1.
  * **current** (*Optional*): Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **voltage** (*Optional*): Use the voltage value of the sensor in volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **active_power** (*Optional*): Use the (active) power value of the sensor in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

phase_b.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Phase B/2 on applicable inverters.
  * All options from **phase_a**
  
  

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

phase_c.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Phase C/3 on applicable inverters.
  * All options from **phase_a**
  
  

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

protocol_version.docs:
Version of the protocol used by your inverter. Old inverters use RTU (default). Newer ones use RTU2 (e.g. MIC, MIN, MAX series)

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

pv1.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Photo Voltaic 1.
  * **current** (*Optional*): Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **voltage** (*Optional*): Use the voltage value of the sensor in volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **active_power** (*Optional*): Use the (active) power value of the sensor in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

pv2.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Photo Voltaic 2.
  * All options from **pv1**
  
  

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `10s`.

*See also: [Growatt Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/growatt_solar.html#configuration-variables)*
